title: Hydro Snowflake
description: Snowflake is an ERC-1484 Provider that provides on-/off-chain identity management.

title: Charging Interest
description: Smart contract to power charging interest in savings, lending, credit, and mortgage dApps.

title: Randomized Lottery Dynamics
description: Allows randomly selected Snowflake IDs to distribute a defined or accruing amount of $hydro.

title: Gift Cards
description: Allows a business to create gift cards for their services and for a user to redeem these gift cards, with unique characteristics.

title: Product Orders
description: Allows a business to create SKUs and inventory management on goods to be sold to customers.

title: Marketplace Coupons
description: Allows a user or business to create coupons tied to Snowflake.

title: Finance Manager
description: Allows a user or business to store user credit cards.
